Title: Provides for the establishment of a biennial budgeting system for the state of New York replacing the state annual budget process
Summary: Provides for the establishment of a biennial budgeting system for the state of New York replacing the state annual budget process.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing amendments to sections 1, 2 and 7 of article 7 of the constitution, in relation to providing for the establishment of a biennial budgeting system for the state replacing the state annual budget process
